Module vasp¶

Input/output interface for VASP.

class pylastic.io.vasp.Energy(fname='vasprun.xml')¶

Get energies from espresso output file.

get_gsenergy()¶

Return groundstate energy.

get_phenergy()¶

Return phonon free energy for temperature T

set_gsenergy()¶

Get groundstate energy from vasprun.xml

set_phenergy(ph_file)¶

Read phonon free energy from phonopy output (default filename: F_TV) for temperature T.

class pylastic.io.vasp.POS(fname='POSCAR')¶

Read/write POSCAR files and structural information.

read_pos()¶

Read poscar file and return structure information as dictionary.

write_pos(pos, fileName)¶

Write POSCAR file.

Parameters:fileName (str) – Filename.
write_sgroup(pos)¶

Write sgroup input file.

Parameters:pos (dict) – Dictionary containing structural information as generated by ‘read_pos()’.
